review_data.title: Fantastic restaurant with delicious food
review_data.content: Friendly welcome to a charming atmospheric Asian restaurant. The menu is full of temptations..we decided for some Chinese dishes.. these were freshly made and delicious! would be happy to visit again!

review_data.title: Good selection of Chinese and Thai food

review_data.title: Seriously good

review_data.title: Best Chinese in Zurich
review_data.content: They offer a range of very tasty Chinese noodle soups (served with nice fixings, too!) in addition to standard Chinese and Thai fare. Independent, laid back atmosphere. Great for pre-movie dinner.

review_data.title: Uninspiring
review_data.content: Uninspiring food that had nothing particularly to recommend it. The portions are extremely large but not worth a repeat visit.

review_data.title: Delicious food
review_data.content: Walked in yesterday for the first time and was surprised by the price,17.50 CHF for a set lunch.that is including Appetizer and main course. Important is the food was fresh,warm and delicious, the staff is complete and kind. We are sure will be back again.

review_data.title: Zurich prices, authentic Chinese and Thai quality

Both portions were generous, two of us couldn't finish it all. Also had an order of spring rolls, a jasmine tea...More

review_data.title: Delicious noudle soup
review_data.content: Once again we went to a Thai restaurant to eat a noodle soup. I ordered the beef vermicelli noudle soup. Very delicious! And the traditional Thai milk tea was not too sweet, just perfect. We'll come again!

review_data.title: best Restaurant

review_data.title: very good food

review_data.title: Very delicious Chinese Food

review_data.title: Very authentic and delicious Chinese food!

review_data.title: Authentic Chinese meal in the old town of Zürich
